name: HSP_CLP_REV_CODE
description: This table contains the revenue code list for the claim print records associated with the hospital account/liability bucket.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record associated with a single hospital account or liability bucket.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date for the creation of the record in internal format. (There is only one contact date per claim print record.)

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UB_MIN_SERVICE
columns.description: The minimum service date for the claim print record.

columns.name: UB_MAX_SERVICE
columns.description: The maximum service date for the claim print record.

columns.name: UB_CHARGES
columns.description: The uniform billing charges on the claim

columns.name: UB_MODIFIER
columns.description: The modifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: UB_CPT_CODE
columns.description: The uniform billing current procedural terminology code on the claim print record.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hospital account associated with this claim print record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWN_ID
columns.description: ID of the physical deployment owner for this record. Physical owners will be where the data is hosted, either on the cross-over server or the owner deployment.

columns.name: REV_CODE_EXT
columns.description: The external uniform billing revenue code.

columns.name: UB_REV_CD_DESC
columns.description: The description of the uniform billing line.

columns.name: UB_HIPPS_CD
columns.description: The uniform billing line health insurance prospective payment system code.

columns.name: UB_QTY
columns.description: The uniform billing line quality.

columns.name: UB_NON_CVD_AMT
columns.description: The non-covered amount for the uniform billing line.

columns.name: UB_LMRP_CD
columns.description: The uniform billing local coverage determination code.

columns.name: UB_HCPCS_RATE
columns.description: The uniform billing healthcare common procedure coding system code and modifier or rate.

columns.name: UB_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The code type for the uniform billing claim line. If there is no code type this field will be blank.

columns.name: UB_PRIOR_AUTH
columns.description: The prior authorization number for the uniform billing line.

columns.name: UB_RFL_NUM
columns.description: The uniform billing line referral number.

columns.name: UB_REND_PROV_ID
columns.description: The line level rendering provider for an American National Standards Institute institutional claim. This will only be populated for a combined claim.

columns.name: UB_LINE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category of the line source for the uniform billing line.

columns.name: UB_REIMB_AMT
columns.description: The reimbursement amount for the uniform billing line.

columns.name: UB_REIMB_CNTRCT_AMT
columns.description: The reimbursement contract amount for the uniform billing line.

columns.name: UB_SVC_DATE
columns.description: The service date of the uniform billing service line.

columns.name: UB_MOLDX_TEST_CODE
columns.description: The auxiliary procedure code for a uniform billing line.

columns.name: UB_AUXPX_CD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of auxiliary procedure code when one is applicable to a uniform billing line.

columns.name: UB_AUTH_ID
columns.description: Stores the hospital billing charge level linked authorization ID.

columns.name: UB_REF_PROV_ID
columns.description: The ID of the line level referring provider. It is only populated under special circumstances.
